content.name: classic facial, 30 minutes
content.description: Deep Cleaning & Extraction of black heads and white heads. A steam and comforting massage, of high frequency that increases blood circulation and provides a nice tone to your skin. Results are immediately noticeable. Your face will be clean, healthy, and shiny.
